library_service_error: To use Creative Cloud Libraries, please install the Creative Cloud desktop application.
library_service_error_ppro: Open a Premiere Pro project to access the Libraries panel.
library_disabled_tooltip: Open a Premiere Pro project to access this library in the Libraries panel.
card_error: There was an error copying your library, please try again later.
card_success_ppro: Download complete. To access library content, open the Libraries panel in a Premiere Pro project.
card_success_subscribe: CC Library acquisition successful, your Library panel will update shortly
card_success_resubscribe: This CC Library has been subscribed already
hide_start_workspace_desc: If you don’t need or want this Start Workspace, you can uncheck ‘Show Start Workspace...’ under Preferences > General.
hide_start_screen_desc: If you don’t need or want this Start Screen, you can uncheck ‘Show Start Screen...’ under Preferences > General.
hide_recentfiles_workspace_desc: If you don’t need or want this Recent Files Workspace, you can uncheck ‘Show Recent Files Workspace...’ under Preferences > General.
mobile_creation_apps: Only compatible apps are being shown
mobile_creation_network: Connection timed out. Please check your internet.
no_mobile_creation_desc: Sketch, draw, paint and create layouts with Adobe's family of mobile apps. With CreativeSync all your apps and assets are connected across your desktop and mobile devices, so you can do great work anywhere.
no_mobile_creation_draw: Create beautiful freeform vector designs on your phone or iPad.
no_mobile_creation_sketch: Create expressive designs anywhere using natural drawing tools.
no_mobile_creation_comp: Create layouts on the go. Transform natural drawing gestures into crisp graphics.
mobile_creation_file_not_found: The requested asset file could not be located.
empty_recentlib_title: Access, organize, and share your assets.
empty_recentlib_subtitle: Creative Cloud Libraries give you quick access to the colors, brushes, images, character and paragraph styles and other assets you use most.
empty_recentfile_title: Your recent work will appear here.
empty_recentfile_subtitle: Click on the “New…” button to create something new, or click the “Open…” button to continue working.
empty_recentfile_new_sub: Create something new with your own settings.
empty_recentfile_preset_sub: Create something new from popular presets.
empty_recentfile_ccfiles_sub: Open something from your personal CC Files.
empty_ccfiles_title: Your Creative Cloud files will appear here.
empty_ccfiles_ps_title: Your Creative Cloud Photoshop .PSD files will appear here.
empty_ccfiles_subtitle: Sync files from your computer to Creative Cloud and access them from anywhere. Files are instantly available on all your connected devices and computers.
ccfiles_loading_error: Please sign in to the Creative Cloud desktop utility and try again.
newdoc_bigtemplate_body:
Large templates will take longer to download.
You can still preview other templates while this template is downloading.
newdoc_details_template_default: Full size preview for this template is unavailable.
empty_ccfiles_cta: View and manage your Creative Cloud Assets on desktop, mobile and the web.
empty_recentfile_subtitle_MUSE: Adobe Muse CC allows designers to create beautiful free form websites without having to write a single line of code.
adobe_stock_find_more: Find more templates on Adobe Stock
newdoc_welcome_banner_saved_title: You can always find it here.
newdoc_welcome_banner_content_recent_tem: Start with your own document settings, pre-formatted [document presets](#category=0) or explore some of our helpful [templates](#category=0) and starter files.
newdoc_welcome_banner_content_recent_no_: Start with your own document settings or from a range of [document presets](#category=0) to get working quickly.
newdoc_welcome_banner_content_saved_temp: This is where you'll find your saved [presets](#category=0) and any free or purchased [templates](#category=0) that you've downloaded.
This is where you'll find your free or purchased [templates](#category=0) that you've downloaded.
newdoc_welcome_banner_content_saved_no_t: This is where you'll find your saved [presets](#category=0).
newdoc_ai_colormode_warning: The chosen color mode is different from the color space defined by the Document Profile. Panel content may not match the new color mode.
